messages: content='write a merge sort function and validate it with examples' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={} id='fcc71da9-6917-4510-b26e-6678c7508e09'

content='def merge_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1:
        return arr
    mid = len(arr) // 2
    left = merge_sort(arr[:mid])
    right = merge_sort(arr[mid:])

    sorted_arr = []
    i = j = 0
    while i < len(left) and j < len(right):
        if left[i] < right[j]:
            sorted_arr.append(left[i])
            i += 1
        else:
            sorted_arr.append(right[j])
            j += 1
    sorted_arr.extend(left[i:])
    sorted_arr.extend(right[j:])
    return sorted_arr

# Validation examples
print(merge_sort([38, 27, 43, 3, 9, 82, 10]))  # [3, 9, 10, 27, 38, 43, 82]
print(merge_sort([5, 2, 4, 6, 1, 3]))           # [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
print(merge_sort([]))                            # []
print(merge_sort([1]))                           # [1]
print(merge_sort([2, 1]))                        # [1, 2]' additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={} id='14bcdf59-d1b2-4235-a010-f61d65f3f1a8'
code_content:
def merge_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1:
        return arr
    mid = len(arr) // 2
    left = merge_sort(arr[:mid])
    right = merge_sort(arr[mid:])

    sorted_arr = []
    i = j = 0
    while i < len(left) and j < len(right):
        if left[i] < right[j]:
            sorted_arr.append(left[i])
            i += 1
        else:
            sorted_arr.append(right[j])
            j += 1
    sorted_arr.extend(left[i:])
    sorted_arr.extend(right[j:])
    return sorted_arr

# Validation examples
print(merge_sort([38, 27, 43, 3, 9, 82, 10]))  # [3, 9, 10, 27, 38, 43, 82]
print(merge_sort([5, 2, 4, 6, 1, 3]))           # [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
print(merge_sort([]))                            # []
print(merge_sort([1]))                           # [1]
print(merge_sort([2, 1]))                        # [1, 2]
